title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Digital Pedagogical Strategies to Enhance Acceptance of E-Learning in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Digital Device Operation Skills and Elementary-Level Mathematics Knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply elementary-level mathematical concepts for medical data analysis with 90% accuracy.
Learners demonstrate teamwork by completing two or more collaborative projects on the e-learning platform.
Learners utilize digital tools (Zoom/Blackboard) to engage in at least two synchronous sessions and asynchronous learning activities per week.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
